mapper.select: select tc.contract_id,tc.contract_no,tc.hospital_id,th.hospital_name,tc.contract_name,tc.contract_file, tc.device_count,tc.accept_date from tb_contract as tc inner join tb_hospital as th on tc.hospital_id = th.hospital_id where tc.contract_id = #{contractId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_contract ( contract_no, contract_name, contract_file, hospital_id, device_count, accept_date, create_time, creater, modify_time, modifier ) values ( #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acceptDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update:
update tb_contract
contract_no = #{contractNo},
contract_name = #{contractName},
contract_file = #{contractFile},
hospital_id = #{hospitalId},
device_count = #{deviceCount},
accept_date = #{acceptDate},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier}
where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
